title: I finally understand why Jinx was buffed now.....
body:
Buff Jinx before....

Star Guardian Jinx
1820 RP....... Seems right.

replies.body: Posted the same theme thread,got downvoted by the braindead community.

It all depends on the first few votes. If you get 2 upvotes, prepare to fly into the hot section with many more upvotes to come.

If you start off with 2 down votes, get your umbrella out because it'll rain more downvotes.

The majority of the people are sheep. Not just in LoL or the boards, but in general.

You think I don't know it?
I've spotted few lurkers already(these kind of morons that spend their time in the new section downvoting every single thread on existence)

That's not what a lurker is, a lurker is somebody that reads a lot of threads and barely ever comments unless it's something they really don't disagree with or are passionate about (like me commenting on this, I usually don't comment on things.)
You're right,I meant silent downvoter
They usually do that in a {{champion:67}} attempt to push their thread to the top and can't get their own upvotes, so they downvote all of the competition.

votes are meaningless honestly
They do mean if there is a gaint difference like 50+ upvotes,but then there are the fanboys and silent downvoters who kill good threads
what makes you think it's going to be an 1820 skin?

Surrender said it will be 1820 while all the others are 1350 RP. Usually if they are shown that price at first then chances it will be that price because they never change the price once it is shown. I know I don't understand why Jinx cost so much more then the others when they all practically have the same amount of animation/ability change but I guess Jinx is more work?

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/09/the-star-guardians-upcoming-janna-jinx.html#more

Ah, didn't realize they already showed the price there, thanks. 
iirc, the difference between an 1350 skin and a legendary (1820) skin is that legendary skins also get new voice overs. 

Considering this is the patch worlds will be played on, I don't think they'd buff her just for better skin sales.

They buffed her to make her appear in worlds. But in the meanwhile, she also became #1 on the ladder. They should've nerfed her in patch 6.19 or 6.20, but this is why they didn't.

######I don't mind, she's my favourite ADC

You should mind, the nerf is gonna be somewhere unrelated to the buff and will severely negatively effect your personal performance while similataneously leaving her in a fine state for everyone else. This is the law of the game.
Yes, i did mind the buff, but I don't mind that she's still not nerfed.
Actually, there are a few nerfs to her E on PBE right now.
She's gonna get a new VO thats why.

They do that a lot with skins of the same type.

Dark Star Thresh cost more than Dark AStar Varus.

The Luch Mundo skin is almost twice as much as Gnar and Volis.

Paker Pantheon cost more than Leonas and Olafs skin for that set.

You can already guess just that Jinx will be 1820 to bring her dialogue more in line with the skin because ya know a star guardian murmuring about killing people and destroying things isn't quite consistent.
Who said a star guardian couldnt kill people or destroy things?

*sigh* here we go again

nerf a champion before a skin release "omg rito you stupid"
buff a champion before a skin release "omg rito you greedy"

realizing that balance release and skin release happen in two different times and as such it would be a huge commitment to syncronize the release? never happens.

plus, they did not need to buff jinx to boost sales - she is basically an evergreen

>nerf a champion before a skin release "omg rito you stupid"
buff a champion before a skin release "omg rito you greedy"

There's a thing you can do that's distinctly between these two states. In fact it's the main thing that's done with champions before a skin is released and it's absolutely shit-all.

what about no?

Besides that she was buffed in 6.17 and she is getting a skin in 6.20 so she is far beyond the "buff hype" already, there are many cases ( see - riven ) that a champion got nerfed before a skin release. You just ignore that.
Jinx didn't need a buff.  That's the point.

Thats up to debate, but a different matter. She was buffed several patchs ago for a skin thats been in the works for MONTHS.

Also theres a hundreds of other factors that go into buffing a champion other then win rate, ban rate, etc. From the statistics we see she seemed okay. Riot almost certainly has other data, so whether she needed a buff or not is debatable.

( I personally don't think so )

Jinx was ALREADY one of the most popular champions before the buff. 

These fucking conspiracies about riot buffing champions when they get a skin is getting really stupid. You are guys are legit turning into tinfoil hat people

Well, because of how strong Jinx was before the buffs, the only alternative theory that's plausible for why she was buffed is that Riot is incompetent.

So, pick your poison I guess.
What do you mean by that? _takes the tinfoil hat off_
And then they nerf her the following patch, right?
Or they will "experiment" with small small nerfs that don't really affect Jinx,but make it seem as if they are trying to tune her power. #Conspiracy

Like when they nerfed her rocket attackspeed but gave her passive a massive to more than make up for it? 

What I don't get is how they can let her sit at an almost 54% winrate and almost 20% playrate without nerfs but nerf anyone else in similar situations right away. Hell, she's only up there right now because some geniuses thought 52-53% winrate ~15% playrate wasn't high enough for her...
gotta sell those skins man
Welcome to the LoL boards, where people think playrate and winrate are indisputable proof of if a champion is OP or UP.

> [{quoted}](name=Ron Pitts,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yE2mlzOs,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2016-09-20T17:21:11.777+0000)

She's strong right now because the outliers keeping her down (jhin and ashe)  got nerfs. Hardly anything to do with the ult buff that only matters once every 70 seconds if an enemy is already close to death

Are you saying boosting the bonus AD scaling on her ult by 50% did ***nothing*** to her winrate? I find it hard to believe that Jhin and Ashe were the ones "keeping her down" when she still had a ~14-15% play rate. Them being nerfed might've opened Jinx up to be picked even more than she already was, but her winrate was already 52-53% as well so she was doing more than fine before while they were "keeping her down." 

Regardless of any of that though, buffing a champion with a 14-15% play rate and 52-53% winrate is just ridiculous on it's own.

> [{quoted}](name=Ron Pitts,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yE2mlzOs,comment-id=00060000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-21T16:52:46.065+0000)

Them being nerfed might've opened Jinx up to be picked even more than she already was, but her winrate was already 52-53% as well so she was doing more than fine before while they were "keeping her down." 
> 
> Regardless of any of that though, buffing a champion with a 14-15% play rate and 52-53% winrate is just ridiculous on it's own.

I'm saying it's not worth the circle jerk, it has a long cd and tbh she needed some love after her rocket changes

Except she really didn't. She was (and is now even more so) far from needing any sort of buffs. Champions with such a high playrate usually don't also have winrates as high as Jinx does. By the way, **60 seconds is NOT a long cooldown for any ult**, _**let alone a global execute**_. Ashe and Draven's global skillshot ults both sit at 80 seconds and most other global ults are upwards of two minutes.

And speaking as a Yasuo main, one thread is nothing when it comes to angry circle jerking.
